details: The Arc browser has transformed the way I browse the web, and organize my endless open tabs in the form of notes, folders, spaces. It has also transformed the way I think about personalized technology--there is a lot of room to challenge the traditional software paradigms, and experiment with alternate infrastructures.

I believe my unique background in psychology, user experience / frontend software design engineering, and masters in creative technology will be a valuable asset for the BCNY Product Engineering Fellowship Program.
I am passionate about the intersection of research and technological implementation.
